attributes.title: This is terrible
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever had, it lags like crazy, and always glitches.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is so terrible!!! doesn’t work, doesn’t do anything, and it’s just disgusting to have an app for this man 🤢 get rude of it and keep tik tok !!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: the setup for this app is disgusting every time I open the app I have to look a moldy looking Cheeto puffs then a horribly ugly orange it’s disgusting. Smh this makes me want for the BLUE even more.

attributes.title: Terrible… just terrible
attributes.review: Just like every other review this app is terrible.🍊 id rather have annoying orange be President.

attributes.title: blm ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.review: horrible app, after i downloaded this app my phone crashed and i had to take it to the apple store to fix it. i forgot to delete and and come to find out it's been talking money every month. don't get this app it broke my phone, and now i'm broke 🤮

attributes.title: 0/10 wouldn't recommend
attributes.review: uses your location even when you're off the app which's makes your battery drain and takes forever to download. if i could give it zero stars i would.

attributes.title: Almost caused death🤢
attributes.review: I almost died from this app seeing a Cheeto with a yellow wig on my screen😱 it almost gave me a heart attack🤬 you meanie head 🥺

attributes.title: 0/10 do not recommend
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to know more about the old cheeto of a president only for my phone to get a virus and now my screen is orange. i also called for help but the person on the phone kept barking at me (literally) and growled. please do not download this app.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is absolutely TERRIBLE!!!! it took the whole night to download and it made my phone glitch out

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: The app kept glitching and crashed my phone. I had to get a new phone 😡😞
